name: Star Daemon
description:
As a researcher on a planet that sits on the outskirts of the galaxy you set out to find the source of a peculiar signal. Flying a basic exploration ship you get hijacked by a fleet of alien spaceships. In order to survive you must upgrade your ship by salvaging the wreckage. Destiny of stars, planets and all that they feed depends on your space pilot moves. Priveus be with you.

- Intense space fights
- Intriguing story (check your neural log when it is blinking)
- Awesome graphics
- Cool ship upgrades (homing missles, companion gunners, etc...)
